text: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِىٍّ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translation.en.sahih: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan tiada seorang nabipun datang kepada mereka melainkan mereka selalu memperolok-olokkannya.
